Module com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.common
Package com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.common.net

Class StandardSocketSettingSpecConstants

java.lang.Object
com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.common.net.StandardSocketSettingSpecConstants
public final class StandardSocketSettingSpecConstants extends Object
Standard SocketSettingSpec constants.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final SocketSettingSpec<UnsignedByte>
    IP_TOS
    SocketSettingSpec constant for IP_TOS: an UnsignedByte that describes the type-of-service or traffic class field in the IP header for a TCP or UDP socket.
    static final SocketSettingSpec<PerformancePreferences>
    PERF_PREFS
    SocketSettingSpec constant for PERF_PREFS: Performance preferences for a TCP socket described by three digits whose values indicate the relative importance of short connection time, low latency, and high bandwidth.
    static final SocketSettingSpec<Boolean>
    SO_BROADCAST
    SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_BROADCAST: a Boolean value to indicate if broadcast datagrams can be sent.
    static final SocketSettingSpec<Boolean>
    SO_KEEPALIVE
    SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_KEEPALIVE: a Boolean value to indicate if a TCP socket can be kept alive when no data has been exchanged in either direction.
    static final SocketSettingSpec<NonNegativeInteger>
    SO_LINGER
    SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_LINGER: a NonNegativeInteger of the number of seconds of lingering on closing the TCP socket.
    static final SocketSettingSpec<PositiveInteger>
    SO_RCVBUF
    SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_RCVBUF: a PositiveInteger of the receive buffer size.
    static final SocketSettingSpec<Boolean>
    SO_REUSEADDR
    SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_REUSEADDR: a Boolean value to indicate if the socket address and port can be reused.
    static final SocketSettingSpec<PositiveInteger>
    SO_SNDBUF
    SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_SNDBUF: a PositiveInteger of the send buffer size.
    static final SocketSettingSpec<NonNegativeInteger>
    SO_TIMEOUT
    SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_TIMEOUT: a NonNegativeInteger of the timeout in milliseconds on waiting for an idle socket.
    static final SocketSettingSpec<Boolean>
    TCP_NODELAY
    SocketSettingSpec constant for TCP_NODELAY: a Boolean value to indicate disabling Nagle's algorithm.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Map<String,SocketSettingSpec<Object>>
    valuesMap()
    Returns an unmodifiable Map of the SocketSettingSpec constants each associated by the name they specify for their SocketSetting.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • IP_TOS

      public static final SocketSettingSpec<UnsignedByte> IP_TOS
      SocketSettingSpec constant for IP_TOS: an UnsignedByte that describes the type-of-service or traffic class field in the IP header for a TCP or UDP socket. The SocketSetting can only be applied to the following objects: DatagramSocket, Socket.

    • PERF_PREFS

      public static final SocketSettingSpec<PerformancePreferences> PERF_PREFS
      SocketSettingSpec constant for PERF_PREFS: Performance preferences for a TCP socket described by three digits whose values indicate the relative importance of short connection time, low latency, and high bandwidth. The SocketSetting can only be applied to the following objects: ServerSocket, Socket.

    • SO_BROADCAST

      public static final SocketSettingSpec<Boolean> SO_BROADCAST
      SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_BROADCAST: a Boolean value to indicate if broadcast datagrams can be sent. The SocketSetting can only be applied to the following objects: DatagramSocket.

    • SO_KEEPALIVE

      public static final SocketSettingSpec<Boolean> SO_KEEPALIVE
      SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_KEEPALIVE: a Boolean value to indicate if a TCP socket can be kept alive when no data has been exchanged in either direction. The SocketSetting can only be applied to the following objects: Socket.

    • SO_LINGER

      public static final SocketSettingSpec<NonNegativeInteger> SO_LINGER
      SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_LINGER: a NonNegativeInteger of the number of seconds of lingering on closing the TCP socket. The SocketSetting can only be applied on the following objects: Socket.

    • SO_RCVBUF

      public static final SocketSettingSpec<PositiveInteger> SO_RCVBUF
      SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_RCVBUF: a PositiveInteger of the receive buffer size. The SocketSetting can only be applied to the following objects: DatagramSocket, ServerSocket, Socket.

    • SO_REUSEADDR

      public static final SocketSettingSpec<Boolean> SO_REUSEADDR
      SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_REUSEADDR: a Boolean value to indicate if the socket address and port can be reused. The SocketSetting can only be applied to the following objects: DatagramSocket, ServerSocket, Socket.

    • SO_SNDBUF

      public static final SocketSettingSpec<PositiveInteger> SO_SNDBUF
      SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_SNDBUF: a PositiveInteger of the send buffer size. The SocketSetting can only be applied to the following objects: DatagramSocket, Socket.

    • SO_TIMEOUT

      public static final SocketSettingSpec<NonNegativeInteger> SO_TIMEOUT
      SocketSettingSpec constant for SO_TIMEOUT: a NonNegativeInteger of the timeout in milliseconds on waiting for an idle socket. The SocketSetting can only be applied to the following objects: DatagramSocket, ServerSocket, Socket.

    • TCP_NODELAY

      public static final SocketSettingSpec<Boolean> TCP_NODELAY
      SocketSettingSpec constant for TCP_NODELAY: a Boolean value to indicate disabling Nagle's algorithm. The SocketSetting can only be applied to the following objects: Socket.

  • Method Details

      public static Map<String,SocketSettingSpec<Object>> valuesMap()
      Returns an unmodifiable Map of the SocketSettingSpec constants each associated by the name they specify for their SocketSetting.
